channel.title: Running the server
channel.description:
i already downloaded java ...i got jdku14. i already set my classpath and path right.... when i compile it compiles good but when i run it just dissapears
could someone help me please? Thanks xx robie xx

item.title: Running the server
item.dc:creator: @xx_robie_xx xx robie xx
item.description:
@xx_robie_xx wrote:

nope it did not work it just said javac is not an internal command or someting like dat and closes up fast…

crap now a client i had its not working no more it probably gots to do something with the classpath and path thing…

could anyone give me a tut about that please

Read full topic

item.title: Running the server
item.dc:creator: @Ill_Pk_You Ill Pk You
item.description:
@Ill_Pk_You wrote:

put this as ur run.bat.

@echo off title ####### java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

That’s what I’ve got for mine.

Read full topic
